title: Lower price increases TR in elastic range of D

content.question: Which of the following is true in the elastic range of a firm's demand curve?

choices.label: The firm should expand output to increase economic profits.
An increase in price will also lead to an increase in total cost.
A decrease in price will likely lead to an increase in total revenue.
The firm is maximizing total revenue.

content.answer: A decrease in price will likely lead to an increase in total revenue.
